data.title: Bar Graph
data.statement:
<<Goal>>: Create a sideways bar graph with "-" for places.
You will get [[N]] numbers ([[X]]). You must factor out the GCD (Greatest Common Divisor) print the GCD, then print out a bar graph with hyphens for places. (Remember that each hyphen will be worth the GCD, so if the GCD is 2, then to print 4 it would only be "--", not "----".)
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read X:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> N numbers to make a bar graph out of.
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: A number you must factor and make into a bar.
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The product of all the prime factors you removed.
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: Hyphens for bar graphs condensed by what you removed.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Goal: Create a sideways bar graph with "-" for places.
You will get N numbers (X). You must factor out the GCD (Greatest Common Divisor) print the GCD, then print out a bar graph with hyphens for places. (Remember that each hyphen will be worth the GCD, so if the GCD is 2, then to print 4 it would only be "--", not "----".)
Input
Line 1 : N numbers to make a bar graph out of.
Next N lines: A number you must factor and make into a bar.
Output
Line 1: The product of all the prime factors you removed.
Next N lines: Hyphens for bar graphs condensed by what you removed.
Constraints
1 < N < 21
0 < X < 512
Example
Input
2
2
4
Output
2
-
--
